ABOUT_ME.TEXT:
Hello, I'm Dora.

Ever since I was young, I’ve been fascinated by informatics and solving IT-related challenges—especially when it meant getting a game or program to work just right.
That curiosity led me to build personal websites as a hobby, where I found joy in crafting visually appealing and user-friendly experiences.
As a frontend developer, I love combining design with problem-solving to create creative, functional solutions. I’m always eager to learn new things and open to new challenges—that’s why I believe we’d make a great team.

SKILLS.TEXT: I've gained solid experience with frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SCSS, and Angular, along with TypeScript and Firebase. I'm always eager to learn and adapt to new tools to build efficient and modern solutions.
SKILLS.SKILL_EXTRA: Also, I'm interested in diving into:

PROJECTS_OVERVIEW.TEXT: Feel free to check out my projects – each one is built with a focus on responsive design, user-friendliness, and clean, efficient code. I strive to create solutions that are both functional and visually engaging across all devices.
PROJECTS_OVERVIEW.JOIN_TEXT: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks, drag and drop function, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS_OVERVIEW.SPOOKY_TEXT: Jump, tun and throw game based on object-orientated approach. Help Skeleton Warrior to find coins and bottles to fight against the enemies.
PROJECTS_OVERVIEW.DABUBBLE_TEXT: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

REFERENCES.TEXT_1: Working with Dora was always positive and constructive. She communicates clearly, works reliably and with high quality, and is open to feedback. With her proactive, team-oriented, and solution-focused attitude, she makes a valuable contribution to the project's success.
REFERENCES.TEXT_2: Dora quickly adapts to new situations and takes initiative without needing constant direction. They handle challenges calmly and deliver results even under pressure. It's a great support having someone so self-sufficient and dependable on the team.
REFERENCES.TEXT_3: Dora is a true team player. They listen actively, support others without hesitation, and create a collaborative atmosphere where everyone feels heard. Her positive attitude and cooperative mindset make working together smooth and enjoyable.

CONTACT.TEXT_1: I’d be delighted to hear from you! I’m especially eager to take on opportunities where I can use my frontend expertise to contribute to cutting-edge projects. With my skills and enthusiasm for learning, I’m confident I can add real value to your team.
CONTACT.TEXT_2: Beyond technical abilities, I bring creativity and a strong team spirit. Let’s work together to tackle exciting challenges and create outstanding outcomes!
CONTACT.NAME: What's your name?
CONTACT.PP: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

JOIN.TEXT_1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
JOIN.TEXT_2: In the Join project, I developed a platform to enhance user communication and collaboration. Using JavaScript, React, and Node.js, I built a user-friendly frontend and a robust backend. A key feature was real-time communication. Working in an agile team allowed us to adapt and improve the platform continuously.

SPOOKY.TEXT_1: Jump, tun and throw game based on object-orientated approach. Help Skeleton Warrior to find coins and bottles to fight against the enemies.
SPOOKY.TEXT_2: In the project Spooky Town, I developed an exciting jump-and-run game using object-oriented programming. Players control a Skeletor warrior, collecting coins and bottles while battling wild Wraiths. I implemented the game mechanics in JavaScript, using an object-oriented approach to structure characters and their interactions. The game features interactive elements, challenging boss fights, and immersive sound effects.

DABUBBLE.TEXT_1: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
DABUBBLE.TEXT_2: Short text that describes your role or the workflow for this specific project. Let a recruiter know more about your knowledge and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a structured way.
